com.algolia.instantsearch.ui.databinding

Class RenderingHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.algolia.instantsearch.ui.databinding.RenderingHelper

  • public class RenderingHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains mappings between a view+attribute to highlight and its appropriate highlighting color.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      • getHighlightColor

        public java.lang.Integer getHighlightColor(@NonNull
                                           android.view.View view,
                                           @NonNull
                                           java.lang.String attribute)
        Gets the highlighting color for a given view/attribute pair.
        Parameters:
        view - the view using this attribute.
        attribute - the attribute's name.
        Returns:
        the ColorInt associated with this view/attribute pair, or 0 if there is none.

      • shouldHighlight

        public boolean shouldHighlight(@NonNull
                               android.view.View view,
                               @NonNull
                               java.lang.String attribute)
        Checks if an attribute should be highlighted in a view.
        Parameters:
        view - the view using this attribute.
        attribute - the attribute's name.
        Returns:
        true if the attribute was marked for highlighting.
